statements: SELECT * FROM secure_payment_gateway;
SELECT id, amount, transaction_date FROM secure_payment_gateway WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT encrypted_transaction_data FROM secure_payment_gateway WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT id, customer_id, amount, transaction_date FROM secure_payment_gateway ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT id, customer_id, amount, transaction_date FROM secure_payment_gateway WHERE id BETWEEN 500 AND 600;
SELECT * FROM secure_payment_gateway ORDER BY amount DESC, transaction_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, customer_id, amount FROM secure_payment_gateway WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM secure_payment_gateway GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 500;
SELECT MAX(amount) AS highest_amount FROM secure_payment_gateway;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(id) AS transaction_count FROM secure_payment_gateway GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY transaction_count DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, payment_method FROM customers WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT customer_id, payment_info FROM customers WHERE customer_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_status = 'Success' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_transactions > 2;
SELECT customer_name, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_spent FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_status = 'completed';
SELECT payment_method, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM payments GROUP BY payment_method;
SELECT payment_date, customer_name, transaction_status FROM payments p JOIN transactions t ON p.payment_id = t.payment_id WHERE p.customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_status FROM transactions WHERE transaction_status = 'complete' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT payment_id, payment_date, payment_method FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_id;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email, customer_address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT t.transaction_date, c.customer_name, tm.method_name FROM transactions t JOIN customers c ON t.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN payment_methods tm ON t.method_id = tm.method_id;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, transaction_date FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT method_name, is_secure FROM payment_methods WHERE method_name LIKE '%card%';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT customer_name, log_description, log_timestamp FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id JOIN transaction_logs ON transactions.transaction_id = transaction_logs.transaction_id WHERE log_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (2, 4, 6, 8, 10);
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_datetime >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY order_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_price FROM products ORDER BY product_price ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_phone LIKE '+1%';
SELECT order_id, order_amount, payment_method FROM orders WHERE order_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products ORDER BY product_price DESC;

SELECT customer_name, order_amount, payment_amount FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN transactions t ON o.order_id = t.order_id JOIN payments p ON t.transaction_id = p.transaction_id WHERE payment_status = 'Success' ORDER BY order_amount ASC;
